amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and clarifying changes; reduces the size of the land conveyance in Title IV; conforms the text of Title VI to the House-passed version of the bill from the 111th Congress; and reduces the authorization of Title VIII to conform with Leadership protocols.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-539 to make technical and clarifying changes; reduce the size of the land conveyance in Title IV; conform the text of Title VI to the House-passed version of the bill from the 111th Congress; and reduce the authorization of Title VIII to conform with Leadership protocols.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
